game.name: SUBSUMED
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A claustrophobic first-person horror game about crawling through a dark, winding cave system in search of three missing divers.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A claustrophobic first-person horror game about crawling through a dark, winding cave system in search of three missing divers.
